principles: Follow cutting-edge liquid glass UI principles - translucent surfaces with proper light diffusion
Implement depth through layering and subtle shadows
Use subtle animations to convey state changes and interactions
Ensure consistent spacing, typography, and color usage throughout
Design must be visually stunning while maintaining perfect usability
inspiration: Stripe dashboard (data visualization and information hierarchy)

requirements: Every component must be fully functional, not just a mockup
Build with real data integration, not simulated placeholders
Implement proper state management across the entire application
Ensure responsive design that works on all screen sizes
Optimize performance to ensure immediate responsiveness

standards: Use TypeScript with proper typing throughout
Implement component-based architecture with clear separation of concerns
Follow React best practices (hooks, context, etc.)
Implement proper error handling and loading states

requirements: Use Next.js 14+ with App Router and React Server Components
Implement proper data fetching strategies (SWR/React Query)
Create optimistic UI updates for immediate feedback
Build with accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA) in mind
Ensure proper SEO optimization where applicable
